channel.title: Kindle on Dheepak's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Kindle on Dheepak's blog

item.title: Longreads with Kindle
item.description: E-Commerce, eBooks, Prime Video & music even for some AWS. This is the list of items that my close surroundings say about Amazon’s domain. Kindle is mostly overlooked or not prominently known among people. Kindle is a strange product from Amazon. Unlike its Video/music or retail site, Kindle appeals to a narrow circle - readers. Even among the readers, there is a split between ebook and physical book readers. Firstly, it’s the only hardware product from Amazon.
